title: Every nerf to Tank Ekko
body: Is another reason not to build him as intended. You might have to just rework his kit in the future

Still don't get why his ult does damage. You go back in time, changing your location and your damage to that point in time. That's a very powerful tool but it fits his theme too, of time travel. It's a really fucking cool ability. 

That if he uses it because he's out of position and accidentally happens to hit someone with, that person explodes and dies. Wat.
Makes no sense that it does damage, to me. It's like if Weaver from DotA2 or Tracer from Overwatch/HotS did damage on their time-rewind abilities.

I wouldn't even be that mad if they gave ekko's ult a "bomb" portion kinda like tracer's ult. It would damage him if he didn't rewind far enough away, forcing him to make intelligent decisions about how to use it. But honestly, it would be a lot easier if they just removed the damage entirely. Or  lessened it dramatically.
I'd also be fine with the damage going away, and just working on that heal, that way his kit takes a hit but will still remain a threat.
Honestly, tank ekko might be "balanced" with a change like this.

The thing I hate most about the fucker is his Q. At early levels the outgoing damage is on par with other mid mages, and the incoming damage is just icing on the cake. The slow also starts at the high end of non-decaying kit slows in mid and then rapidly scales to bullshit levels.

It's one of those abilities that it good in literally every situation. Poke, waveclear, zoning, chasing, kiting, duels, team fights, etc. And it's basically spammable given it's forgiving mana cost.

The Q is bullshit. But also having two other slows that scale from 40-60% is what makes him so fucking broken. That's basically support tank level cc.
Instead of nerfing the %damage, they should just remove it entirely. Boom, problem solved. He doesn't need it as an AP assassin anyway.

Just something I thought id throw out there.  

Current "tank ekko" is actually just a bruiser.  It builds 1 dmg item maybe two (Triforce and maybe abyssal usually) and then goes tank, and late game his dmg  with this build falls off really hard against anything with a few defensive items, especially due to his bad ad scaling.  Similarly Jax and Irelia build 1 or two dmg items and then go tank and have escapes and cc too.  Is bruiser ekko annoying?  Yes.  Is he impossible to deal with when ahead?  Often times yes.  Is he broken?  Personally idk, but since he was initially intended to be an "assassin" everyone gets super mad that ekko isnt being one.  

Maybe his destiny is to be an ap diver or skirmisher instead of an assassin (something like jarvan/vi/diana or either fiora/yasuo/irelia/jax) that deals decent consistent dmg and is often not full glass cannon.  In my opinion ap assasin ekko would still be somewhat viable (like ad jarvan) but unless his dmg becomes more reliable, specifically his Q, he will always tends towards tankier builds that let him get his dmg off.  And maybe this diving or skirmisher role with the option of full ap as just an optional build can be accepted as ok by riot and the community.
As someone who enjoys playing him as intended, this saddens me.
